world.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • world.entity.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Asteroid, Bullet, Ship

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    A class of entities involving a position, velocity, direction, speed limit.

        Returns:

        protected boolean canHaveAsVelocity(Velocity velocity)
        Checks whether this entity can have the given velocity as its velocity.
        Parameters:
        velocity - The velocity to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given velocity is not null and its magnitude is at most the speed limit. | result = ((velocity != null) && (velocity.getVelocity() <= getSpeedLimit()))

        Returns:

      • getSpeedLimit

        public double getSpeedLimit()
        Returns the speed limit of this entity.

      • canHaveAsSpeedLimit

        protected static boolean canHaveAsSpeedLimit(double speedLimit)
        Checks whether an entity can have the given speed limit as its speed limit.
        Parameters:
        speedLimit - The speed limit to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given speed limit is positive and at most the speed of light. | result = ((speedLimit >= 0) && (speedLimit <= Velocity.getSpeedOfLight()))

      • overlapsWith

        public boolean overlapsWith(Entity e)
        Checks whether the given entity overlaps with this entity.
        Parameters:
        e - The given entity.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given entity is null of the distance between the entities is smaller than the sum of the radii | result == ((e != null) && (this.distanceTo(e) < getShape().getRadius() + e.getShape().getRadius()))

        public double distanceBetween(Entity other,
                     double duration)
                       throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                              java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Return the distance between this entity and the given entity, if both would move during the given duration.
        Parameters:
        other - The given entity
        duration - The given duration.
        Returns:
        the distance between this entity and the other entity, if both would move during the given time. Util.fuzzyEquals(result, | this.getPosition().getPositionAfterMove(getVelocity(), | duration).getDistanceTo(other.getPosition().getPositionAfterMove(other.getVelocity(), duration)) - (this.getShape().getRadius() + other.getShape().getRadius());)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - The given entity is null | other == null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - The given duration is strictly negative | moveTime < 0.0
